ch.iserver.ace
Class CaretUpdate

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.CaretUpdate

public class CaretUpdate
extends Object

A CaretUpdate encapsulates the details of an update to the caret. The caret consists of a dot (the position of the cursor) and a mark. If both are at the same position, there is no selection. Otherwise the selection starts at the mark and ends at the dot.

Method Detail

getDot

public int getDot()
Retrieves the dot value of this instance. The dot represents the current position of the blinking cursor.

Returns:
the dot value

getMark

public int getMark()
Retrieves the mark value of this instance. The mark represents the current position of the other end of the selection.

Returns:
the mark value

getIndices

public int[] getIndices()
Gets an array consisting of dot and mark. The dot value is in the first position of the array, the mark value in the second.

Returns:
array consisting of dot and mark (index 0 and 1 respecitvely)

equals

public boolean equals(Object obj)
Compares the passed in object obj to this instance. Two CaretUpdate instances are equal if they have the same values for their dot and mark properties.
